result.name: index-of-place-names-in-great-britain-july-20169
result.notes:
This file contains the digital points for the Index of Place Names in Great Britain as at July 2016. Contains both Ordnance Survey and ONS Intellectual Property Rights. 

REST URL of ArcGIS for INSPIRE View Service – https://ons-inspire.esriuk.com/arcgis/rest/services/Other_Products/Index_of_Place_Names_July_2016/MapServer/exts/InspireView 

REST URL of ArcGIS for INSPIRE Feature Download Service – https://ons-inspire.esriuk.com/arcgis/rest/services/Other_Products/Index_of_Place_Names_July_2016/MapServer/exts/InspireFeatureDownload

REST URL of Feature Service – https://ons-inspire.esriuk.com/arcgis/rest/services/Other_Products/Index_of_Place_Names_July_2016/FeatureServer

organization.name: office-for-national-statistics
organization.title: Office for National Statistics
organization.description:
The Office for National Statistics (ONS) is the UK’s largest independent producer of official statistics and is the recognised national statistical institute for the UK. It is responsible for collecting and publishing statistics related to the economy, population and society at national, regional and local levels. It also conducts the census in England and Wales every ten years. 

The ONS plays a leading role in national and international good practice in the production of official statistics. It is the executive office of the UK Statistics Authority and although they are separate, they are still closely related.
